org.mindswap.common
Class CompletedFuture<V>

java.lang.Object
  org.mindswap.common.CompletedFuture<V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Future<V>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompletedFuture.Exception, CompletedFuture.Success
public abstract class CompletedFuture<V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Future<V>

A simple Future implementation which is completed as of instantiation because the result or an exception is injected at instantiation time.

          To be used for unsuccessfull completion.
